Package com.midiwars.logic

Class Player

  • Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    A music player for midi files. (Singleton)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Player.State
      The current state of the player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BREAK_DURATION
      Amount of time (ms) to sleep in-between songs.
      static int SMALL_BREAK_DURATION
      Amount of time (ms) to sleep when moving to next or previous song.

      • getInstance

        public static Player getInstance​()
        Getter.
        Returns:
        The instance.

      • getState

        public Player.State getState​()
        Getter.
        Returns:
        The current state of the app.

      • resume

        public void resume​()
            throws AWTException,
                   InterruptedException,
                   InvalidMidiDataException,
                   IOException
        Resumes playback.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.

      • play

        public void play​(String[] playlist,
                 boolean shuffle,
                 boolean repeat,
                 Instrument instrument)
          throws AWTException,
                 InterruptedException,
                 InvalidMidiDataException,
                 IOException
        Starts playback.
        Parameters:
        playlist - Playlist to play.
        shuffle - True if player should switch to shuffle mode.
        repeat - True if playlist should repeat upon ending.
        instrument - Instrument to play given playlist with.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.

      • stop

        public void stop​()
          throws InterruptedException
        Stops playback.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.

      • pause

        public void pause​()
           throws InterruptedException
        Pauses playback.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.

      • next

        public void next​()
          throws AWTException,
                 InterruptedException,
                 InvalidMidiDataException,
                 IOException
        Plays the next song.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.

      • prev

        public void prev​()
          throws AWTException,
                 InterruptedException,
                 InvalidMidiDataException,
                 IOException
        Plays previous song.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.
